revision.text:
{{Infobox Berry |name = Pamtre |image = [[File:Pamtre.png]] |caption = This Berry drifted from a faraway sea. It is now cultivated in the Sinnoh region. |growtime = 5h 0m 0s |harvest = 31 berries |replant = 10% |points = 950 |flavor = {{!}} 0 {{!}} 30 {{!}} 10 {{!}} 0 {{!}} 0 }} '''Pamtre''' is a type of [[Berries|Berry]] that can be planted in [[Farm]]. It can be obtained by surrounding a [[Cornn]] with at least 130, but no more than 160 points of dry and no more than 80 points of all other flavours. The [[Cornn]] will then have a chance to mutate into this berry. {| class="wikitable" |+ Harvest Stages durations ! Seed !! Sprout !! Taller !! Bloom !! Berry |- | 0-3000s || 3000-10000s || 10000-16400s || 16400-18000s || 18000-36000s |- | [[File:AllTreeSeed.png|50px]] || [[File:AllTreeSprout.png|50px]] || [[File:PamtreTreeTaller.png|50px]] || [[File:PamtreTreeBloom.png|50px]] || [[File:PamtreTreeBerry.png|50px]] |} === Possible Planting Formations === You can fill your [[farm]] in following way to obtain Pamtre berry. {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |+ Farm |- | style="width: 50px;" | [[File:Cornn.png|30px]]
